short_summary: Medical Radiation Technologist (X-Ray Technician) for Correctional Service Canada
full_summary:
### Termin: Medical Radiation Technologist 
#### Description

The Correctional Service Canada has released a tender announcement for the provision of medical radiation services at the Warkworth Institution. The primary objective of this tender is to provide radiography services to assist with the diagnosis, treatment, and management of inmate health issues.

**Scope of Work**

The contractor shall be responsible for generating x-ray images in accordance with clinically acceptable standards for the purpose of assisting with the diagnosis, treatment, and management of offender illness. The contractor will be required to work from Warkworth Institution and must be proficient in the English language.

The requirement encompasses the provision of the following services:

* Generate x-ray images as per the instructions of the Medical Staff at Warkworth Institution
* Perform radiography services in compliance with Canadian health standards and regulations
* Ensure the quality and accuracy of radiography images
* Maintain confidentiality and adhere to institutional policies and procedures

**Key Dates**

* **Publication Date**: April 5, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: May 3, 2024, 2:00 p.m. ET
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 31, 2029

**Eligibility Criteria**
To be eligible to participate in this tender, applicants must meet the following conditions:

* Hold a valid license as a Medical Radiation Technologist in the province of Ontario
* Have a minimum of 2 years of experience in x-ray imaging
* Demonstrate expertise in radiography techniques and procedures
* Be able to provide mandatory certifications and proof of training as required by the Radiological Protection Act

**Submission Instructions**

Proposal submissions must be sent electronically through the Government of Canada's testosterone electronic tendering system. The request for proposal document can be downloaded from [this URL](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/pub/notice/notice/tender-notice-list.html).

**Contact Information**

For any inquiries or information, please contact:
Danielle Murdoch, Correctional Services Canada
danielle.murdoch@csc-scc.gc.ca
(343) 422-4831

Please note that only eligible applicants will be considered for this tender. Late submissions will not be accepted. *
